title: Person Role
description: A qualified association between a Person or OrganisationalUnit and an entity such as an ObjectGroup or MeasurementOrFact that enables the relationship to be contextualised with a specific role and time period.

role.description: A role played by a Person in the context of an entity such as an ObjectGroup, OrganisationalUnit or RecordLevel.

startedAtTime.description: The date or time when a Person started fulfilling the role specified in the role property.

endedAtTime.description: The date or time when a Person stopped fulfilling the role specified in the role property.

hasPerson.description: This property refers to one or more related instances of the Person class.

hasAddress.description: This property refers to one or more related instances of the Address class.

hasContactDetail.description: This property refers to one or more related instances of the ContactDetail class.

hasIdentifier.description: This property refers to one or more related instances of the Identifier class.

hasReference.description: This property refers to one or more related instances of the Reference class.

hasTemporalCoverage.description: This property refers to one or more related instances of the TemporalCoverage class.

hasMeasurementOrFact.description: This property refers to one or more related instances of the MeasurementOrFact class.
